EmailTemplate.name: 201903_Americas_Duncan_Primus_Elite_MC.201903_Americas_Duncan_PrimusElite_Email4
EmailTemplate.subject: Act Now! $35,000 Trade In Credit Ends Soon!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.duncanaviation.aero/]]>
Avoid obsolescence. Receive a $35,000 trade-in credit per display unit (no limit) when you update your CRT DU-870 to the Primus Elite DU-875 LCD display with Duncan Aviation.
The Primus Elite DU-875 liquid crystal display upgrade delivers brighter, clearer, higher resolution images, and 2X the reliability of your old, obsolete DU-870 CRTs. The upgrade is an easy “plug and play” replacement that can be done in less than a day. Once your displays are upgraded, take advantage of the latest software and technology with Primus Elite Enhanced Features, or add Synthetic Vision System (SVS) with Primus Elite Advanced Features.
Act now! The DU-870 to DU-875 trade-in credit is only available through June 30, 2019.
UPGRADE NOW! <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Duncan_Primus_Elite_201903.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_duncan_primuselite&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=primus+elite]]>
